list_definition.definition: a prize for winning in a sport etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He won a silver trophy for shooting.

list_definition.definition: something which is kept in memory of a victory, success etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He had kept the enemy sword as a trophy of war.
